thirdPersonMode.name: Third Person Mode
thirdPersonMode.description: The third person mode that will be selected when activating BetterPerspective.

unlockCamera.name: Unlock Camera
unlockCamera.description: Allows the camera to be moved freely while BetterPerspective is active. This isn't recommended to be enabled on servers like Hypixel as it might be bannable.

resetToPreviousPerspective.name: Reset Perspective
resetToPreviousPerspective.description: If enabled, the previous perspective will be restored when deactivating BetterPerspective. Otherwise the perspective will be set to first person.

skipFirstPerson.name: Skip First Person
skipFirstPerson.description: If enabled, the first person view will be skipped when pressing F5. Otherwise BetterPerspective will be deactivated.

lockPitchRange.name: Lock Pitch Range
lockPitchRange.description: Locks the pitch range to 180 degrees. Disables the 360 degree pitch range.
